name: VoidBit
description:
Take a journey to the corrupted forest with "Unknown". Wipe all the enemies with your void and decide the future of the forest.

- W A S D    - Movement

- Left Shift - Dash

- J          - Throw Void

- U          - Reset the Room

-M           - Mute Audio

(Made for Blossom Game Jam hosted by ITU Game Design and Development Club)
